excerpt: "BenchmarkPortal has announced that Gateway First Bank has been certified as a “Center of Excellence,” which is one of the most prestigious awards in the customer service and support industry. BenchmarkPortal only awards this designation to customer service contact centers that rank in the top 10% of centers surveyed across the nation."
